utils

Class RecreateBinsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.RecreateBinsClient

  • public class RecreateBinsClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a client for the generation of bin images from the generated Bin-*.txt given at the end of the algorithm and the original input points file.
    Author:
    Moises Baly
